General.Name: East China Engineering Science and Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: East China Engineering Science and Technology Co., Ltd. operates as an engineering company in the People's Republic of China. The company engages in research and development, consulting, engineering design, procurement, construction management, start-up instruction, project supervision, general contracting, PMC management, operation, and other projects construction services. It serves chemical, petrochemical, new materials, new energy, ecological environmental protection, infrastructure, biomedicine, and other industries. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Hefei, the People's Republic of China. East China Engineering Science and Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of East China Engineering Corporation.
